snippet: The price of a barrel of oil was nearing $30, though tech stocks were up, and health insurance companies also gained.
abstract: Stock market closes with modest gain due to late-afternoon rally after volatile day.
lead_paragraph: The price of a barrel of oil was nearing $30, though tech stocks were up, and health insurance companies also gained.

headline.main: Rally Late in Volatile Session Leads to Modest Gain in Stocks
headline.print_headline: Rally Late in Volatile Day Leads to Modest Gain
